channel.title: Music – Gustaf Spetz

item.title: Gustaf Spetz - You And Me
item.description:
작곡: Martin…, Gustaf Spetz / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 95053 / KY: 23910

Whatever I do
and wherever I am
All I can
think of is you
Not a single
thing
Feels sad
for your heart
‘Cause all I can
think of is you
When I am awake
and when I am asleep
All I can
think of is you
The weeks have
turn to days
And the days
turned to hours
‘Cause all I can
think of is you
It doesn’t matter
if the sun is shining
Our if the rain is
pouring down
I can not get you
out of
You’re always
on my mind
You and me
go wild together
In all kinds
of weather
You and me
go wild together
In all kinds
of weather
We are good
for each other

think of is you
